org.apache.hc.core5.http

Interface SocketModalCloseable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable, ModalCloseable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    BHttpConnection, HttpClientConnection, HttpConnection, HttpConnectionEventHandler, HttpServerConnection, IOSession, ProtocolIOSession
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClientH2IOEventHandler, ClientH2StreamMultiplexer, ClientHttp1IOEventHandler, ClientHttp1StreamDuplexer, ClientHttpProtocolNegotiator, DefaultBHttpClientConnection, DefaultBHttpServerConnection, H2OnlyClientProtocolNegotiator, LoggingBHttpClientConnection, LoggingBHttpServerConnection, LoggingIOSession, ServerH2IOEventHandler, ServerH2StreamMultiplexer, ServerHttp1IOEventHandler, ServerHttp1StreamDuplexer, ServerHttpProtocolNegotiator, SSLIOSession

    public interface SocketModalCloseable
extends ModalCloseable
    A generic ModalCloseable backed by a network socket.
    Since:
    5.0
